sentences.en: But Israel miscalculated and to understand the depth of Palestinian nationalistic aspirations.
sentences.cn: 但是,以色列打错了算盘,不能理解巴勒斯坦民族主义愿望的深度.

sentences.en: Do you think Chinese people are excessively nationalistic?
sentences.cn: 你认为人民是过分的民族主义?

sentences.en: In what the Lu Xun thought is most incisive is to the Chinese nationalistic critique.
sentences.cn: 鲁迅思想中最尖锐的是对中国国民性的批判.

sentences.en: It merely reinforces the idea that China is stridently nationalistic and unaccountable.
sentences.cn: 这只能让人们加深对中国不可理喻的民族主义,并一意孤行的印象.

sentences.en: Leaders will have to learn how to overcome nationalistic considerations in the conduct of campaigns.
sentences.cn: 各统帅,应知道如何指导战争并克服各国的自私观念.

sentences.en: Romantics also tend to be nationalistic.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主义者们还体现了强烈的民族精神.

sentences.en: The revival laid the scholarly and nationalistic groundwork for the Irish Literary Renaissance.
sentences.cn: 盖尔语复兴为爱尔兰文学文艺复兴运动奠定了学术和民族主义方面的基础.

sentences.en: They were encouraging nationalistic sentiment among the students.
sentences.cn: 他们在鼓动学生们的民族主义情绪。

sentences.en: This is a movement which was romantic, irrational and vehemently nationalistic in character.
sentences.cn: 这是一场具有荒诞的, 反理性的,鼓吹民族主义性质的运动.

sentences.en: To the people who insult our nationalistic fervour, I see the dark smirk on your face!
sentences.cn: 那些辱骂我们民族主义的中国人们, 我看到了你们脸上不动声色地露出阴郁的笑容.

words.tran_cn: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的
民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家

trans.tran_cn: 民族主义的，国家主义的
trans.tran_en: someone who is nationalistic believes that their country is better than other countries
